actions.committee: House Committee on Education and the Workforce
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

official_title: Expressing support for designation of the week of March 3 through 9, 2013, as "School Social Work Week".
subjects: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

summary.text: Expresses support for the designation of School Social Work Week. Honors the contributions of school social workers to the success of students in schools.

titles.title: Expressing support for designation of the week of March 3 through 9, 2013, as "School Social Work Week".
